string-array.name: whats_new_262
string-array.item: Days where week and month start can be configured

string-array.name: whats_new_249
string-array.item: Display aggregate sums in home screen widget

string-array.name: whats_new_248
string-array.item: The status of cloned transactions is reset to unreconciled
Alternative restore method for devices without file manager

string-array.name: whats_new_246
string-array.item: Transactions can be set to state "Void"

string-array.name: whats_new_245
string-array.item: Export and reset functionality can now be applied to transactions matched by search filter

string-array.name: whats_new_244
string-array.item: Filters for method, payee, status and category now allow multiple selection

string-array.name: whats_new_243
string-array.item: If application is password protected, pictures are stored securely in internal storage

string-array.name: whats_new_241
string-array.item: Pie chart visualizing distribution per category

string-array.name: whats_new_240
string-array.item: Transform normal transaction into split transaction
